subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, the world’s top-ranked golfer, announced a deal Monday that involves his switching to Nike equipment, from Titleist, and that may be worth $100 million to $250 million.
snippet: Rory McIlroy, the world’s top-ranked golfer, announced a deal Monday that involves his switching to Nike equipment, from Titleist, and that may be worth $100 million to $250 million.
